Class Sunflower

java.lang.Object
tp1.p1.logic.gameobjects.Sunflower
public class Sunflower extends Object
Model a sunflower in a game

      public Sunflower(int r, int c, Game currGame)
      Construct and initialize a sunflower
      Parameters:
      r - row position of the sunflower
      c - column position of the sunflower
